title: Higher Education Visual Literacy Practice: Expanding Creative Thinking Through Academic Visual Journaling for [Large-Scale] Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and college-level reading/writing skills
context.additional_context: Language proficiency enhancement program for working professionals, with a primary goal of expanding thinking skills through visual expression.

learning_goals: Learners can creatively reorganize academic content using various visual tools (images, diagrams, digital art).
Learners reflect on their learning process and derive new perspectives through visual journaling.
Learners improve visual expression methods and enhance communication skills based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
